SELECT A.SL_CODE AS slCode, A.PRODUCER_EP_ID AS producerEpId, B.EP_NAME AS producerEpName, A.CONTRACT_NO AS contractNo, A.AUTH_EP_NAME AS authEpName, A.AUTH_TERM_BEGIN AS authTermBegin, A.AUTH_TERM_END AS authTermEnd, A.AUTH_TERM_UNLIIMITED AS authTermUnliimited, A.VER AS ver FROM
sl_ep_agent_auth AS A
sl_ep_oem_auth AS A
LEFT JOIN sl_enterprise B ON A.PRODUCER_EP_ID=B.EP_ID AND B.DEL_FLG = 0 WHERE A.SL_CODE=#{slCode} AND A.DEL_FLG = 0
AND A.PRODUCER_EP_ID=#{producerEpId}

SELECT A.SL_CODE AS slCode, A.SL_ACCOUNT AS slAccount, A.EP_ID AS epId, B.EP_NAME AS epName, A.SL_CODE_DIS AS slCodeDis, A.SELF_FLG AS selfFlg FROM sl_seller AS A LEFT JOIN sl_enterprise B ON A.EP_ID=B.EP_ID AND B.DEL_FLG = 0 WHERE A.SL_CODE=#{slCode} AND A.DEL_FLG = 0
AND A.EP_ID=#{producerEpId}
